info.title: Navigate to an unchecked checkbox in interaction mode

user: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the unchecked state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the unchecked state.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed
